code: export var getNotesByUserId=function getNotesByUserId(id){return fetch("http://localhost:5000/notes?_sort=createdAt&_order=desc&userId=".concat(id)).then(function(r){return r.json();});};export var getNoteById=function getNoteById(id){return fetch("http://localhost:5000/notes/".concat(id)).then(function(r){if(r.status===404)throw new Error();return r.json();});};export var createNote=function createNote(_ref){var userId=_ref.userId,title=_ref.title,body=_ref.body;var createdAt=new Date().toISOString();return fetch("http://localhost:5000/notes",{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify({userId:userId,title:title,body:body,createdAt:createdAt}),headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(r){return r.json();});};export var editNote=function editNote(_ref2){var id=_ref2.id,title=_ref2.title,body=_ref2.body;return fetch("http://localhost:5000/notes/".concat(id),{method:"PATCH",body:JSON.stringify({title:title,body:body}),headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(r){return r.json();});};export var deleteNote=function deleteNote(id){return fetch("http://localhost:5000/notes/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(r){return r.json();});};
